about_the_game: This game invites players into a charming town adventure, where they take on the role of a cute little chick navigating through the town. Using the ASDW keys to control the chick’s movements, players must guide the chick to cross busy streets, dodge cars and gas stations, and find and eat all the grains of rice. The game features bright and clean visuals, with every corner of the town meticulously depicted, from bustling traffic to quiet street corners, all brimming with the feel of everyday life. The background music is light and cheerful, creating a relaxed gaming atmosphere. When the chick successfully eats all the grains of rice, special sound effects and animations reward the player, bringing a sense of achievement. This is not only a game that tests players' reflexes and operational skills but also a fun-filled adventure.

name: Consequently

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980 / AMD Radeon RX 590 / Intel Arc A750
